name: 13th Asia-Pacific Oncologists Annual Meeting
content: Attendees will not only progress their knowledge of metastasis procedures, but also leave the conference with the confidence and intent to apply up-to-the-minute treatment policies to care for their patients with cancer. The vibrant and dynamic atmosphere of the Global Village also motivated largely through its capability to enable connections and networking opportunities. High level glioma research specialists who attended the last past conferences will confirm the Congress has become a not-to-be missed event in the worldwide Oncologic calendar.
